name: What Are You Stupid
description: Prepare to get your knowledge tested by 15 wacky characters in a 1-on-1 quiz battle format; each with their own theme and unique personality. Brace yourself and do well - or get humiliated by them. Inspired by old comic stripes, ‘What Are You Stupid’ is presented using 100% hand-drawn art.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista Processor: Processor 1.8 Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphic 4000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7 Processor: Processor 1.8 Ghz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space
